name: JamJam
description:
Jam Jam!

Sell fruits or turn them into jam and wine! Small Business Simulation created for GMTK 2022 Jam. Features 18 fruits and some fun facts about them. Will you survive your first year? Will you get the rarest fruit?

This is my first Jam entry ever and I had lots of fun building this. This version is basically minimal viable product and the art is very basic. Developed in Godot.

Currency balance might not be on point since I didnt have much time to playtest.

Huge thank you to Idolon who created a sweet piece of music to jam out to.

Idolon's twitter: https://twitter.com/RevCosmosis
